posts.post_title: FS: N162 Dan Brouthers - beautiful 'Auth' grade card
posts.post_content:
Beautiful Brouthers card with slight trim - great registration and color!

Prices are by check or money order (add 3% for Paypal), shipped and insured.

Brouthers SGC Auth (trimmed left) - $480
